Notes: A point in space where the requested number of Coins will be spawned after activating its SW_APPEAR switch.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Coins
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of Coins to be spawned. Default is 8.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
